title: How to Download Google Play Store Applications to a PC

steps.title: Download Bluestacks 5 or Bluestacks 10 from https://www.bluestacks.com.
steps.content: Download Bluestacks 5 or Bluestacks 10 from https://www.bluestacks.com . Both allow you to download Google Play apps. Bluestacks 5: Bluestacks 5 is the standard Bluestacks emulator, which lets you access the Google Play Store and download, install, and play Android apps on your PC. You do not need an internet connection to play installed apps, but you do need good hardware. Bluestacks 10: This cloud-based emulator allows you to use Android apps over the internet without having to download and install them. Choose this option if you have a slow PC but a fast internet connection. Once you decide on a version, click the Download button for the version you want to install. This saves the installer on your PC.

steps.title: Install and launch Bluestacks.
steps.content: Install and launch Bluestacks. To install Bluestacks 5 or 10: Double-click the .EXE file you downloaded from Bluestacks.com. Click Yes to run the installer. Click Install now and follow the on-screen instructions. Once installed, open Bluestacks from the Start menu.

steps.title: Click the Google Play Store in Bluestacks .
steps.content: Click the Google Play Store in Bluestacks . It's a multicolored triangle icon on the Home page. This will open the Google Play Store. If you are not on the Home page, click the house in the upper-left corner.

steps.title: Log in to your Google account.
steps.content: Log in to your Google account. To download apps from the Google Play Store, you need to log in to your Google account . Log in with the username and password associated with your Google account.

steps.title: Search for the app you want to download.
steps.content: Search for the app you want to download. In the Search bar at the top of the screen, type the name of the app you want to install, or type of app youâ€™re interested in. Once you find the app you want, click to select it.

steps.title: Click INSTALL.
steps.content: Click INSTALL . It's a green button in the upper-right side of the page. Your app will begin downloading onto Bluestacks' "My Apps" tab. If asked to allow the app to access specific permissions, click ACCEPT when prompted before proceeding.

steps.title: Open your app.
steps.content: Open your app. To do so, use one of the following steps once the app finishes installing: Click OPEN in the Google Play Store. Click the icon that resembles a house in the upper-left corner. Then click the app icon to start your app.

steps.title: Install an APK file.
steps.content: Install an APK file. If you downloaded an APK from the Google Play Store or the internet, you can install the APK file directly to Bluestacks by doing the following: [1] X Research source Open Bluestacks if it isn't already open. Click the "Install APK" button in the menu to the right. It has an icon that says "APK" with a "+" sign above it. Select your APK file. Click Open

steps.title: Go to https://play.google.com/googleplaygames in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://play.google.com/googleplaygames in a web browser. Google Play Games allows you to play Android mobile games on your PC. While this application is still in Beta (meaning, it's still being developed and might be buggy or have missing features), you can still use it to download Android apps and games to your PC.

steps.title: Click Download Beta.
steps.content: Click Download Beta . It's the green button in the lower-left side of the web page. This downloads the Google Play Installation file to your PC.

steps.title: Run the installer.
steps.content: Run the installer. Double-click the Install-GooglePlayGames-Beta.exe file, click Yes , and follow the on-screen instructions to install. When the installation is complete, you'll be prompted to sign in to your Google account.

steps.title: Sign in with your Google account.
steps.content: Sign in with your Google account. To do so, click the white button that says Sign in with Google . Then either select your Google account or log in with the username and password associated with your Google account. If you don't have a Google account, you can create one easily.

steps.title: Browse the available games.
steps.content: Browse the available games. Google Play Games beta doesn't have a search function just yet, but you can browse the available Play Store games and select the one you want.

steps.title: Select a game and click Install.
steps.content: Select a game and click Install . This installs the Google Play game. You can find Google Play Games you have installed in your Library or Downloads menu. To play, click a game, then click the green Play button.

steps.title: Install APK Downloader for Google Chrome.
steps.content: Install APK Downloader for Google Chrome. By installing a free extension in Google Chrome, you can download the APK file for any free Android app on the Google Play Store. Keep in mind that you can't use this method to download paid apps. You won't be able to open the APK file without special software (e.g., Bluestacks ), or by using an [ Android phone or tablet ]. In the Google Chrome browser , go to https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/apk-downloader/bmblbechbdbgaebdioelojhkhenkkjpf in a web browser. Click Add to Chrome Click Add Extension .

steps.title: Go to https://play.google.com/store/apps in Chrome.
steps.content: Go to https://play.google.com/store/apps in Chrome. This will open the Google Play Store on your PC.

steps.title: Search for an app.
steps.content: Search for an app. To do so, click the magnifying glass icon in the upper-right corner. Then type the name of an app you want to download or a search term related to the app. Click the app you want to download in the search results. This opens the app's information page.

steps.title: Open the APK Downloader extension.
steps.content: Open the APK Downloader extension. To do so, click the puzzle piece icon in the upper-right corner of Google Chrome, then click APK Downloader .

steps.title: Click Download APK.
steps.content: Click Download APK . It's the blue button in the APK Downloader pop-up window. This downloads the APK file. You can find your downloaded files in your Downloads folder. by default.
